string-array.name: ExternLibrary_Explain
string-array.item: This package contains the basic functionalities that all App Center services use to communicate with the backend.
This package contains functionalities to collect session, device properties, events etc... for your application.
This package contains functionalities to collect crash reports for your application.
Color picker library for Xamarin Android
Syncfusion licensing is a .NET library for validating the registered Syncfusion license in an application at runtime.
Syncfusion Charts for Xamarin.Android provides a perfect way to visualize data with a high level of user interactivity that focuses on development, productivity, and simplicity of use.
A light-weight and easy to use cross-platform audio player for Windows UWP/WPF, Xamarin.iOS, Xamarin.Android, Xamarin.Mac, Xamarin.tvOS, Tizen and Xamarin.Forms.
AVLoadingIndicatorView is a collection of nice loading animations for Android.
Xamarin.Android binding for PhotoView - Implementation of ImageView for Android that supports zooming, by various touch gestures.
Xamarin.Essentials - a kit of essential APIs for your apps
